<small>Also see: [[H5771]] | [[H5869]]</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺנָה‎</span>] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינָה‎</span>] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] **noun feminine** only suffix [[Hos.10.10|Hos 10:10]]: [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺנֹתָם‎</span> [[BDB#Baer|Baer]], singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺנָתָם‎</span> [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]]; &gt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֹתָם‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]; but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲוֺנֹתָם‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוֺן‎</span> **1 a.**. 

<small>Also see: [[H5771]]</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹנָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==cohabitation== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺנָה‎</span> ***time***, also = Biblical Hebrew; possibly ***response or correspondence, commerce***, from above √; or else euphemistic, specific ***time***, [[BDB#SS|SS]] (compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 17</sup>, from √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עון‎</span> dwell); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹנָתָהּ‎</span> [[Exod.21.10|Exod 21:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) i.e. her marriage rights. — [[Hos.10.10|Hos 10:10]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוֺן‎</span>
